mainText:
Dear Apple,
 Steve Jobs was a great man who changed the world and will be remembered
forever. Throughout history he has made ground breaking innovations that
have set standards so high that no-one will ever come close to, with the
help of Apple. I want to thank him for all of his hard work and he did an
amazing job at what he did. I hope that he never worked a day in his life
because he loved what he did. I will always remember him and always look up
to him. Steve Jobs, thank you and rest in peace.
author: Connor
